title: The Amsterdam Deception
description: On David Knight's first international tour with Canada’s premier ballet company, two thugs grab him as he and his best friend are touring Amsterdam’s famous red-light district and immediately he's hurled into a world he only knows from reading spy novels.David is taken to a clinic owned by Richard Reynolds, a billionaire with a serious problem. A prototype for a device that could save his company has gone missing and the only one who knew its whereabouts, a cold war spy, is dead. To find the missing device Reynolds needs forces David to undergo a procedure to "host" the last 30 seconds of the spy’s memories. But when the procedure goes awry, all the spy’s memories, skills, and abilities download into David and break him free from Reynold’s clinic. Dazed and disoriented, he stumbles out into the Amsterdam night, a stranger in an exotic city.Reynolds needs him alive, but a rich televangelist wants him dead. With people he doesn't know searching for him can another man’s memories protect him long enough to survive the battle between religious greed and corporate profits?
author: Tony Ollivier
